Package com.burstly.lib.conveniencelayer

Contains Convience Layer (CL) classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BurstlyAnimatedBanner.IAnimationListener Listener for animation events
IActivityListener IActivityListener receives callbacks for onPause, onResume, and onDestroy Activity events
IBurstlyListener Burstly Listener receives ad event callbacks
ICacheable Interface provides method for caching an ad to be shown later
IFragmentListener IFragmentListener receives callbacks for onPause, onResume, and onDestroy Fragment events
 

Class Summary
Burstly Burstly is a singleton which takes care of initializing and shutting down the SDK as well as keeping a list of BurstlyViews associated with each activity so that they can be notified of activity pause and resume events.
BurstlyActivity Wraps Activity events and dispatches them to the Burstly Convencience Layer subsystem.
BurstlyAnimatedBanner AnimatedBanner is used to handle the use case of a banner which is not always visible.
BurstlyBanner A default static banner ad placement which is attached to an activity and left visible and active during the life of the Activity
BurstlyBaseAd The BurstlyBaseAd is the base convenience layer wrapper class for all ads.
BurstlyFragment Extension of a fragment used by Burstly.
BurstlyInterstitial BurstlyInterstitial should be used with zones marked as interstitial zones in the burstly.com UI and will be launched in their own activity.
BurstlyListenerAdapter  
 

Enum Summary
BurstlyAnimatedBanner.State The state of the ad
BurstlyBaseAd.AdType The general type of ad unit
BurstlyBaseAd.CachingState The state of having a ad cached
BurstlyIntegrationModeAdNetworks  
 

Package com.burstly.lib.conveniencelayer Description

Contains Convience Layer (CL) classes. CL is used to simplify SDK public API.
